Topic.Title: List when Speak, Speak to, Talk, Talk To

Posts.EditableText: How do you do a list when you are speaking to an object?
Posts.HTML: How do you do a list when you are speaking to an object?

Posts.EditableText: I always do built-in "menus" for conversation because I feel it is more relateable and personal - developing relationships between player and NPCs.  I can certainly help with this method.  If you want to use pop-up menus to choose from a list of options, someone else will have to help as I've never used them.
Posts.HTML: I always do built-in "menus" for conversation because I feel it is more relateable and personal - developing relationships between player and NPCs. I can certainly help with this method. If you want to use pop-up menus to choose from a list of options, someone else will have to help as I've never used them.
